tns:patch.keyword: Update geo code field for countries with ids from geonames.org
tns:patch.author: gmutuhu

script.lang: UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 203312 WHERE iso ILIKE 'CD'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 2287781 WHERE iso ILIKE 'CI'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 2413451 WHERE iso ILIKE 'GM'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 3608932 WHERE iso ILIKE 'HN'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 3723988 WHERE iso ILIKE 'HT'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 831053 WHERE iso ILIKE 'KS'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 2275384 WHERE iso ILIKE 'LR'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 617790 WHERE iso ILIKE 'MD'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 1062947 WHERE iso ILIKE 'MG'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 2440476 WHERE iso ILIKE 'NE'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 1282988 WHERE iso ILIKE 'NP'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 2245662 WHERE iso ILIKE 'SN'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 2434508 WHERE iso ILIKE 'TD'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 1966436 WHERE iso ILIKE 'TP'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 831053 WHERE iso ILIKE 'XK'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 1527747 WHERE iso ILIKE 'KG'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 1655842 WHERE iso ILIKE 'LA'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 927384 WHERE iso ILIKE 'MW'; UPDATE amp_category_value_location SET geo_code = 226074 WHERE iso ILIKE 'UG';
